info.task: navigate backwards to a button inside a banner landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards to a button inside a banner landmark

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterBannerAndHideBottomLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the banner landmark, and hides the last link inside the landmark region

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Show Headings' button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Show Headings' button.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Button description is conveyed as: 'Visually outline the landmarks and/or headings on the page'
